Build ID: tptpaide-2007-03-21-16-33-35

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a new WSDM Project i,e Test1
2.Right click on the Test1 project and click New->Other.. menu so that "Select a Wizard" window comes up
3.Here maximize "Tooling for WebServices Distributed Management" tree node
4. Select either "New WSDM Management Endpoint Capability" or "New WSDM Management Endpoint Type" and click "Next" button error throws up
